# Patchwork module

> **来源**: <https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/verse-api/fortnitedotcom/devices/patchwork>
> **爬取时间**: 2025-12-27T01:45:58.102197

---

- [`Fortnite.com`](/documentation/en-us/fortnite/verse-api/fortnitedotcom)
- [`Devices`](/documentation/en-us/fortnite/verse-api/fortnitedotcom/devices)
- **`Patchwork`**

## Classes and Structs

| Name | Description |
| --- | --- |
| [`patchwork_device`](/documentation/en-us/fortnite/verse-api/fortnitedotcom/devices/patchwork/patchwork_device) | Base class for all Patchwork devices. |
| [`drum_sequencer_device`](/documentation/en-us/fortnite/verse-api/fortnitedotcom/devices/patchwork/drum_sequencer_device) | Create drum note patterns for Patchwork devices. |
| [`cable_splitter_device`](/documentation/en-us/fortnite/verse-api/fortnitedotcom/devices/patchwork/cable_splitter_device) |  |
| [`distortion_effect_device`](/documentation/en-us/fortnite/verse-api/fortnitedotcom/devices/patchwork/distortion_effect_device) | Apply a distortion effect to Patchwork audio inputs. |
| [`lfo_modulator_device`](/documentation/en-us/fortnite/verse-api/fortnitedotcom/devices/patchwork/lfo_modulator_device) | Modify a setting on another Patchwork device in a regularly repeating pattern. |
| [`instrument_player_device`](/documentation/en-us/fortnite/verse-api/fortnitedotcom/devices/patchwork/instrument_player_device) | Turn Patchwork note inputs into audio using instrument samples. |
| [`note_trigger_device`](/documentation/en-us/fortnite/verse-api/fortnitedotcom/devices/patchwork/note_trigger_device) | Send events to devices based on Patchwork note inputs. |
| [`song_sync_device`](/documentation/en-us/fortnite/verse-api/fortnitedotcom/devices/patchwork/song_sync_device) |  |
| [`step_modulator_device`](/documentation/en-us/fortnite/verse-api/fortnitedotcom/devices/patchwork/step_modulator_device) | Modify a setting on another Patchwork device in steps over time. |
| [`omega_synthesizer_device`](/documentation/en-us/fortnite/verse-api/fortnitedotcom/devices/patchwork/omega_synthesizer_device) | Turn Patchwork note inputs into audio using customizable sound synthesis. |
| [`drum_player_device`](/documentation/en-us/fortnite/verse-api/fortnitedotcom/devices/patchwork/drum_player_device) | Turn Patchwork note inputs into audio using drum samples. |
| [`echo_effect_device`](/documentation/en-us/fortnite/verse-api/fortnitedotcom/devices/patchwork/echo_effect_device) | Apply an echo effect to Patchwork audio inputs. |
| [`note_sequencer_device`](/documentation/en-us/fortnite/verse-api/fortnitedotcom/devices/patchwork/note_sequencer_device) | Create melodic note patterns for Patchwork devices. |
| [`music_manager_device`](/documentation/en-us/fortnite/verse-api/fortnitedotcom/devices/patchwork/music_manager_device) | Provides a shared tempo, key, and timeline for Patchwork devices to follow. |
| [`note_progressor_device`](/documentation/en-us/fortnite/verse-api/fortnitedotcom/devices/patchwork/note_progressor_device) | Transpose Patchwork note inputs to follow a chord progression. |
| [`value_setter_device`](/documentation/en-us/fortnite/verse-api/fortnitedotcom/devices/patchwork/value_setter_device) | Modify a setting on another Patchwork device when triggered. |
| [`speaker_device`](/documentation/en-us/fortnite/verse-api/fortnitedotcom/devices/patchwork/speaker_device) | Output Patchwork audio for players to hear. |
